name: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle Atarisized
summary: This is a hack of Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle where the graphics have been changed to resemble graphics found on the Atari 2600. Also included is a patch with 64 all new levels. The graphics and levels were created in separate patch files so that they may be compatible with other hacks. For example, the graphics patch may be applied to other level hacks where the graphics were left unchanged.
